ABOUT_MENU.ABOUT:
Okay, let‚Äôs start!
Kingston LC is the very first Learning Centre, which focuses solely on English teaching and preparing for the international tests like IELTS, TOEFL and CEFR.
More than 300 students have chosen us owing to our highly qualified teaching staff, which possess IELTS certificates of 7.0 and 8.0. Apart from this, we are the first and only centre which has a tight partnership with the British Council.
Our courses include such programmes like General English from Beginner Level to Adavanced and preparation for IELTS and CEFR. Also, we offer a short-term couse for those who want to travel to foreign countries and need to master basic English in a short period of time.
We differ from other centres in the region because we focus on the practical aspect of the language as we assume it is more helpful to master the language. Our strategy helps our students to speak, write read and listen in English.
Our mission is that we want to assist the dwellers of Syrdarya region, particularly the youth to achieve their cherished dreams and goals.
Want to know more about us? Call us to +998972755665 or visit our instagram profile @kingston.lc
